long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Random pattern string generation tool.
This tool usable Development support, Password generation and general purpose utility.

This tool supporting some generation format.
- Alphabet
- Numeric (integer)
- Hexadecimal
- UUID
- Base64 (The tool randomly places the letters available in Base64.)
- Custom (The tool randomly sorts the letters user choose.)
Each mode offers several options.
For details, please check the display in the tool.
